messages.content:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi! I'm your **AI Career Coach** â€” Tell me your **skills and interests**,  
and I'll suggest your **top 3 matching career paths**.

So â€” **tell me a bit about yourself!**

1. **Full Stack Developer** A. **Why it fits:** Your love for Java suggests a strong interest in backend development, which is a core component of full-stack development.
B. **Key Skills Needed:** - JavaScript - Python - APIs - Databases C. **Next Steps:** - Enroll in a full-stack development course or bootcamp. - Build a portfolio of projects showcasing your skills. - Network with other developers and attend industry events.
2. **Web Developer** A. **Why it fits:** Your interest in Java could translate well to web development, as Java is often used in backend systems that power websites.
B. **Key Skills Needed:** - HTML - CSS - JavaScript - APIs C. **Next Steps:** - Start learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. - Practice building simple websites and web applications. - Explore different web development frameworks.
3. **UX/UI Designer** A. **Why it fits:** While Java is primarily a backend language, your interest in it could translate to a passion for user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design.
B. **Key Skills Needed:** - Wireframing - Prototyping - Figma - User Research C. **Next Steps:** - Explore UX/UI design resources and courses. - Practice designing user flows and wireframes. - Build a portfolio of UX/UI design projects.
You have a great foundation to build upon. Keep exploring and learning!

top_roles.title: Full Stack Developer
top_roles.description: Works on both frontend and backend web applications. Key skills include JavaScript, Python, APIs, and Databases.

top_roles.title: Web Developer
top_roles.description: Builds and maintains websites and web applications. Key skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and APIs.

top_roles.title: UX/UI Designer
top_roles.description: Designs intuitive user interfaces and improves user experience. Key skills include Wireframing, Prototyping, Figma, and User Research.
